data.title: 200 Greatest Funk Songs
data.meta_description: List of 200 Greatest Funk Songs plus Top 10 Post Disco Funk Songs, Top 15 G-Funk Songs, Top 5 Electro-Funk Songs, and Top 6 New School Funk Songs.
data.text:
